info.name: shortest rotation dot (91 chars)
info.description:
sin( iTime  + vec2(33,0) ) ~= vec2(cos,sin)   
33 is a twice better approximation of pi/2[2pi] than 1.6  while saving 1 char (but 1.57 occur to be very better... at the cost of +2 chars ;-) )

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage( O, U )      \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy;   \
    O += .1 / length( (U+U-R)/R.y - sin( iTime  + vec2(33,0) ) )
        
        
        
// and concerning rotation matrix:  U *= mat2(cos( a + vec4(0,33,11,0)))  //33,55
renderpass.name: Image
